section.para: Returns a value depending on the time condition.

The time-condition follows the format time|dayofweek|date|month; each parameter may also be a range separated by -, or contain the wildcard *. Time is given in 24 hour format (e.g. 08:00-18:00), weekdays and month names are three-letter English language abbreviations (mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun and jan, feb, mar, apr, may, jun, jul, aug, sep, oct, nov, dec).; Valid from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mondays, 1st to the 15th of December: exten => 123,1,Set(foo=${IFTIME(08:00-18:00|mon|1-15|dec?5:0)})
; Valid every Saturday and Sunday: exten => 123,1,Set(foo=${IFTIME(*|sat-sun|*|*?5:0)})
